title: Luminary Garden Party: Cezanne
short_description: Celebrate the groundbreaking retrospective Cezanne with an evening of art, cocktails, and music in the garden. This once-in-a-generation exhibition sheds new light not only on how this pivotal artist created his works, but also why his art remains so vital today.
list_description: Celebrate Cezanne with an evening of art, cocktails, and music in the garden.
description:
Celebrate the groundbreaking retrospective Cezanne with an evening of art, cocktails, and music in the garden. This once-in-a-generation exhibition sheds new light not only on how this pivotal artist created his works, but also why his art remains so vital today.

This event is exclusive to Luminary. Valet parking and coat check will be available.

So that you can enjoy your experience safely, all museum visiting policies at the time of the event must be observed.

Contact Us

If you have questions or are interested in learning more about Luminary membership, we’d be delighted to hear from you. Please contact us at (312) 443-3735 or luminary@artic.edu.
buy_button_caption:
Online reservations for this event have now closed. Please contact 

luminary@artic.edu to inquire about availability.
